Message: R3Connection.CreateFunction() now supports ABAP types decfloat16 and decfloat34 (transferred as byte arrays)
Bug fix for using < or > sign in IDoc segment description texts while saving the Schema to an XML file
Added authority object B_ALE_RECV to customizing check
Correction for inadequate info message when receiving an empty resultset "Failing to rename column..."
BAPIDefinition.Columns contains only columns, which are part of the result now
